description:
The Akudarma trio travel to Tokyo in 1870 in order to find Saigo Takamori. However, they encounter a rather plump gentleman... who apparently is Saigo Takamori. The trio is surprised because he looks nothing like his statue in Ueno. Saigo-san has to go on a diet, or his life is in danger. He also apparently wants a dog, so the trio promise to find him one in exchange for the Dynamond. And then Tokio and Calen show up and they have a face off to see who can find the perfect dog for Saigo-san.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meiji Ishin no Tateyakusha Saigou Takamori ga Inu o Tsurete Ita Bikkuri Dokkuri na Riyuu to wa!?
What`s the Super Surprising Reason One of the Major Players of the Meiji Restoration, Saigo Takamori, Had a Dog?!
明治維新の立役者西郷隆盛が犬を連れていたビックリドッキリな理由とは!?
